KINGURRA

A classic yacht based in Melbourne, Australia

The Boat

Kingurra is a 41ft timber boat based at Royal Brighton Yacht Club, Melbourne, Australia.

Races

She has raced in 20 Sydney-Hobart races, 2 Admirals Cups, and etc. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Pellentesque vitae odio congue, ultricies ipsum eget, euismod est.
